      Adds a course in the add-drop window
      void confirmRegistration()
      Confirms the student's registration using their selected Primary and Secondary courses This also sets their regDone value to true, showing that their registration for the semester is completed

      Given the list of primary courses, this sets SemRegistration record of the student with the given list (overwrites it)

      • displayRegisteredCourses

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> displayRegisteredCourses()
